Description: FEATURING $3 VODKA COCKTAILSJoin us at Interlude Monday - Friday for happy hour from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. Enjoy vodka cocktails and beer specials for only $3 each! The Cromwell_s casino lounge, is the perfect spot to meet up with friends for a drink and enjoy free live entertainment.Located in the heart of the gaming floor, Interlude is surrounded by all the action, making it the perfect spot to connect with friends and socialize. Booth and table seating offer intimate spaces to gather. Video poker fans can enjoy plenty of space at the bar where friendly bartenders are quick with a cocktail.
Location: 3595 S Las Vegas Blvd,  Las Vegas, NV 89109, US
